data.eml:eml: First record of the genus Lethades Davis, 1897 from the Oriental region, with description of a new species (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Ctenopelmatinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Reshchikov, Alexey, Xu, Zai-fu, Pang, Hong (2017): First record of the genus Lethades Davis, 1897 from the Oriental region, with description of a new species (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Ctenopelmatinae). ZooKeys 644: 43-50, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.644.10491, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.644.10491
